TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 控件的有关信息，该控件无需创建实例即可显示在 Web 部件控件目录中。

span.span: Provides information about a control that you can display in a catalog of Web Parts controls without having to create an instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件显示在目录中的用户可以添加到页面的控件，每个控件有关的一些基本信息是必需的。When controls are displayed in a catalog of controls that users can add to a page, some basic information about each control is required. 例如，它是一些有用的标题控件，并输入说明，以便用户查看目录具有足够的信息来决定是否将控件添加到页。For example, it is useful to have a title for the control, and a description, so that as users view a catalog they have enough information to decide whether to add a control to the page. 但是的目录控件可能包含很多控件，以及它将影响应用程序的性能的实例时，如果每个必须创建控件以提取要在目录中显示的信息。However, a catalog of controls can potentially contain many controls, and it could affect the performance of an application if an instance of every control must be created to extract the information to display in the catalog. 类存在，以便不需要创建的实例控件检索有关控件的目录中是否显示控件的信息。The class exists so that it is not necessary to create an instance of a control to retrieve the information about the control that is displayed in a catalog of controls. 在 Web 部件控件集，对象还与各种结合使用控件在目录页时显示模式。In the Web Parts control set, a object is also used in conjunction with the various controls when a page is in catalog display mode. 类具有其构造函数，另一个采用两个重载作为参数实例时可用的控件 (构造函数)，和另一个采用多个字符串作为相关的信息参数 (构造函数)。The class has two overloads of its constructor, one that takes a control as a parameter when an instance is available (the constructor), and one that takes several strings with information about the control as parameters (the constructor). 类还具有几个属性设计为包含的说明信息控件。The class also has several properties designed to contain the description information for controls. 下表总结了属性，并且每个属性对应于在控件。The following table summarizes the properties, and what property each one corresponds to in a control. |Description 属性Description property|相关的部件控件属性Related part control property| |--------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的类。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the class. 通常，主要由 Web 部件控件集，使用此类型，但此代码示例仅演示主要描述属性的基本编程用法。Ordinarily, this type is used primarily by the Web Parts control set, but this code example is simply showing basic programmatic usage of the main description properties. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用户能够更改用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. - 自定义控件。A custom control. - Web 页后，可以托管其他控件。A Web page to host the other controls. - 下面的代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 用户控件的源代码来自于另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 用户控件有关的更多详细信息，请参阅主题[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about the user control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是一个自定义控件。The second part of the code example is a custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用的动态编译的方法。This code example uses the approach of dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是两个`Register`指令： 一个注册用户控件，另一个用于注册自定义其源文件位于你的站点的 App_Code 文件夹中的控件。Near the top are two `Register` directives: one that registers the user control, and the other to register the custom control whose source file is located in the App_Code folder of your site. 页包含``元素，它又包含对两个控件的声明性引用： 自定义控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`，和一个Web 服务器控件，将被视为控件在运行时间，因为控件将包装其与对象。The page contains an `` element, which in turn contains declarative references to two controls: the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, and a Web server control that will be treated as a control at run time because the control will wrap it with a object. 请注意，在代码`Button1_Click`方法，可用对象使用在目录中的控件进行检索方法，然后说明的详细信息所有写出到页。Note that in the code for the `Button1_Click` method, the available objects for the controls in the catalog are retrieved using the method, and then the description details are all written out to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**目录**页切换到目录的显示模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to change the page to catalog display mode. 在目录中，你应看到这两个控件可添加到页面。In the catalog, you should see the two controls that are available to be added to the page. 单击**列表 web 部件说明信息**按钮，然后代码写出所有可用的值到页面的对象。Click the **List WebPartDescription Information** button, and the code writes out the values of all available objects to the page. 此示例演示你可以检索说明详细信息目录中，而无需创建控件本身的实例中的控件。This demonstrates that you can retrieve description details for controls in a catalog without having to create instances of the controls themselves.

summary.span: 初始化包含特定 控件有关信息的类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a specific control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关重载构造函数都返回的新实例类，其中包含有关特定信息控件。The overloads for the constructor each return a new instance of the class, which contains information about a specific control. 重载之间的区别是在其中创建新的实例的方案。The difference between the overloads is the scenario in which the new instance is created. 在某些情况下，应用程序的可用实例控件，使用构造函数。In some cases, when the application has an available instance of a control, the constructor is used. 当应用程序未控件实例，因为正在通过导入的控件说明文件时，将这种情况控件，使用构造函数。When the application does not have a control instance, as is the case when a control description file is being imported through the control, the constructor is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart part) cil managed

param.name: part
param.span: 控件，其信息包含在 中。

span.span: A control whose information is contained in a .

summary.span: 如果 控件实例可用，则初始化类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when a control instance is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于创建新对象基于现有控件。The constructor is used for creating a new object based on an existing control. 此构造函数只调用另一个重载，构造函数，获取从属性的所需的参数值上`part`参数。This constructor simply calls the other overload, the constructor, obtaining the required parameter values from properties on the `part` parameter.

exception.span: 的 属性为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The property of is or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartDescription (string id, string title, string description, string imageUrl);

Public Sub New (id As String, title As String, description As String, imageUrl As String)

summary.span: 使用几个包含 控件说明信息的字符串初始化类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using several strings that contain description information for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于创建的新实例类时控件不可用。The constructor is used to create a new instance of the class when a control is not available. 例如，这发生的情况下控制导入的描述文件控件。For example, this occurs in the case of an control when it imports a description file for a control. 它获取创建所需的信息直接从描述文件中，对象和一个实例不存在。It gets the information it needs to create a object directly from the description file, and a instance is not present.

exception.span: 或 为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: or is or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CatalogIconImageUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ CatalogIconImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 URL，该 URL 包含用作 控件图标的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets a URL containing the path to an image used as an icon for a control.

value.span: 包含 URL 的字符串；默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains a URL; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性直接对应属性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果该属性设置上控件，然后在相应的属性对象也将具有一个值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用属性和控件显示在控件的目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果控件具有在属性值分配给它的图标，该图标将显示在控件旁边目录中。If the control has an icon assigned to it in the property value, the icon appears in the catalog next to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息的进行循环目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，下面的代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 控件的说明文本。

span.span: Gets the text of a description for a control.

value.span: 包含 控件说明的字符串；默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that contains the description for a control; the default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性直接对应属性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 如果该属性设置上控件，然后在相应的属性对象也将具有一个值。If that property is set on a control, then the property in the corresponding object will also have a value. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用属性和控件显示在控件的目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 如果控件具有分配给它的说明，则说明显示在目录中为该控件的工具提示。If the control has a description assigned to it, the description appears in the catalog as a ToolTip on the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息的进行循环目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，下面的代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取相应 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of a corresponding control.

value.span: 包含控件 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性不能为`null`; 它必须始终具有一个值。The value of the property cannot be `null`; it must always have a value. 属性直接对应属性。The property corresponds directly to the property. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用属性和控件显示在控件的目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息的进行循环目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，下面的代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Title As String
public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取相应 控件的标题文本。

span.span: Gets the title text of a corresponding control.

value.span: 字符串，包含相应控件的标题。

span.span: A string that contains the title of the corresponding control.

value.span: 默认值是一个计算出的字符串，由 .NET Framework 提供。

span.span: The default value is a calculated string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性直接对应属性。The value of the property corresponds directly to the property. 任何对应控件具有为其属性的值将成为属性; 否则，标题是计算得出的值。Whatever the corresponding control has for its property, that becomes the value of the property; otherwise, the title is a calculated value. 页面时才在目录显示模式下，应用属性和控件显示在控件的目录。The property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a control is being displayed in a catalog of controls. 任何标题分配给控件出现在目录中的控件旁边。Whatever title is assigned to a control appears next to the control in the catalog. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 运行此代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码中`Button1_Click`Web 页的方法演示如何获取的集合在目录中使用的对象方法，然后显示每个详细信息的进行循环目录中的控件通过对象。The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of objects in a catalog using the method, and then to display the details of each control in the catalog by looping through the objects. 请注意，下面的代码中检索属性值。Note that the property value is retrieved in the following code. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/CS/wpDescriptioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDescription_Overview/VB/wpDescriptionvb.aspx#2)]
